alert.note: Alert for Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins; Yates (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 10:19AM EST by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ONONDAGA...SOUTHERN CAYUGA...SENECA...YATES...SCHUYLER...AND TOMPKINS COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by high winds of up to 50 MPH will rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1017 AM EST, a band of snow squalls was along a line extending from near Montezuma to near Monterey and moving east at 35 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Ithaca, Auburn, Van Buren, Baldwinsville, Seneca Falls, Newfield, Waterloo, Hector, Romulus and Fayette. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 39 and near 41. SAFETY INFO... Icy roads are possible as the snow melts on the roadway and then quickly refreezes. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&

area.areaDesc: Onondaga; Schuyler; Seneca; Southern Cayuga; Tompkins; Yates
